@_Dari_ At a certain point, I think it can be explained as a limit in the medium. Why does Anime have so many pointless panty shots? Because, once, that joke made somebody laugh, or the titillation factor once appealed to someone, and it has just been repeated ever since. All fiction is written to appeal to somebody. Porn is no different. So the question then becomes: what about corruption stories can be found appealing? The lose of innocence in a character making the violent sex more appealing; the whole made vile. Maybe... Or it could be... this or that, and I could go on.
